ValidationRule.description: - End Date/Time must be at-least 1 day ahead of Start Date/Time (If there is a value in End Date/Time field) ,
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( End_date__c ) ) , Start_Date__c +1 > End_date__c , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: End Date/Time must be at-least 1 day ahead of Start Date/Time
